snippet.title: Under Canopies - Official Announcement Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Under Canopies is a serene exploration and survival experience. Set your own pace as you immerse yourself in activities like building and decorating your cabin, animal husbandry, crafting delicious meals, and uncovering the hidden secrets and valuable resources scattered throughout nature. Under Canopies is coming to PC (Steam).
